}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Has a set of annoying blue, pink, and orange LEDs.
The device appears to be a JJPlus product (likely similar or identical to the [[JJPlus ExpandarMax9 (NR25UA5)]]) as indicated by the NR25UA part number on the PCB.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:AWUS050NH V2 top.jpg|unit top File:AWUS050NH V1 bot.jpg|unit bottom </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:AWUS050NH V1 board top shield on.jpg|board top, shield on File:AWUS050NH V1 board top.jpg|board top File:AWUS050NH V1 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:ALFA AWUS050NH v1 pcb top.jpg|top of the PCB, RF shield removed, scan File:ALFA AWUS050NH v1 pcb bot.jpg|bottom of the PCB, scan </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
